it.unitn.ing.rista.util
Class WindowUtilities

java.lang.Object
  it.unitn.ing.rista.util.WindowUtilities
public class WindowUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

The WindowUtilities is a class providing methods for managing GUI objects and actions for XRDcat objects. To be used in the JOptionsDialog class and subclass

Since:
JDK1.1
